CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.Name_O__c) , "N/A", "Name - "+Opportunity__r.Name_O__c+" | Mobile -"+ Opportunity__r.Mobile_No_O__c +" | Email - "+ Opportunity__r.Email_Id_O__c +" | Relation - "+ Opportunity__r.Relation_With_Radius_O__c )
CustomField.label: Booking Source (Reference By Others)
